come on, babelfish this page:)
http://www.3-hajime.com/dekigoto23.html
seems to narrate the guys as they spend some time sight seeing, with 
liquor and treats (candy) in hand wearing their uniforms[?].  Babelfish 
translates Mibu "farce" but this is probably an error...but it would be 
interesting if the guys saw themselves portrayed in local 
entertainment...now on a different Japanese site there is a mention of 
puppet plays featuring the Shinsengumi which were performed when the 
group was still active in Kyoto.
